1   package com.mamezou.rms.platform.env;
2   
3   import java.io.IOException;
4   import java.io.InputStream;
5   import java.net.URL;
6   import java.util.Collections;
7   import java.util.Enumeration;
8   import java.util.List;
9   import java.util.function.Predicate;
10  import java.util.jar.Manifest;
11  import java.util.regex.Pattern;
12  import java.util.stream.Collectors;
13  
14  import org.eclipse.microprofile.config.Config;
15  
16  import com.mamezou.rms.platform.util.ResourceUtils;
17  
18  import lombok.Getter;
19  import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
20  
21  @Getter
22  @Slf4j
23  public class MainJarInfo {
24  
25      private static final String UNKNOWN_INFORMATION = "unknown";
26      private static final String MAIN_JAR_PROP = "main.manifest.jar";
27  
28      static final MainJarInfo UNKNOWN_INFO;
29      static {
30          MainJarInfo/MainJarInfo.html#MainJarInfo">MainJarInfo temp = new MainJarInfo();
31          temp.applicationName = UNKNOWN_INFORMATION;
32          temp.jarName = UNKNOWN_INFORMATION;
33          temp.mainClassName = UNKNOWN_INFORMATION;
34          temp.version = UNKNOWN_INFORMATION;
35          temp.buildtimeInfo = UNKNOWN_INFORMATION;
36          UNKNOWN_INFO = temp;
37      }
38  
39      private String applicationName;
40      private String jarName;
41      private String mainClassName;
42      private String version;
43      private String buildtimeInfo;
44  
45  
46      // ----------------------------------------------------- static methods
47  
48      static MainJarInfoBuilder builder() {
49          return new MainJarInfoBuilder();
50      }
51  
52  
53      // ----------------------------------------------------- getter methods
54  
55      public String startupModuleInfo() {
56          if (applicationName.equals(UNKNOWN_INFORMATION)) {
57              return UNKNOWN_INFORMATION;
58          }
59          return applicationName + "/" + jarName + "/" + mainClassName;
60      }
61  
62  
63      // ----------------------------------------------------- inner class def
64  
65      static class MainJarInfoBuilder {
66  
67          MainJarInfo build(Config config) {
68              URL manifestUrl = findTargetManifestUrl(config);
69              return buidFromManifestUrl(manifestUrl);
70          }
71  
72          private URL findTargetManifestUrl(Config config) {
73              String jarFindName = config.getOptionalValue(MAIN_JAR_PROP, String.class).orElse(null);
74              if (jarFindName == null) {
75                  return null;
76              }
77  
78              // find jar metainf
79              Enumeration<URL> metainfResources;
80              try {
81                  metainfResources = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().getResources("META-INF/MANIFEST.MF");
82              } catch (IOException e) {
83                  throw new IllegalStateException(e);
84              }
85  
86              // filter by jar protocol and filename
87              Predicate<Object> findJarMatcher = new FindJarMatcher(jarFindName);
88              List<URL> metainfUrls = Collections.list(metainfResources).stream()
89                                  .filter(url -> url.getProtocol().equals("jar"))
90                                  .filter(url -> findJarMatcher.test(ResourceUtils.extractFilePathStringOfUrl(url)))
91                                  .collect(Collectors.toList());
92  
93              // resolve metainf resource url
94              if (metainfUrls.isEmpty()) {
95                  log.warn("no matched jar or META-INF [{}]", jarFindName);
96                  return null;
97              }
98              if (metainfUrls.size() > 1) {
99                  String urlPaths = metainfUrls.stream().map(URL::toString).collect(Collectors.joining(System.lineSeparator()));
100                 log.warn("to many match jar or META-INF [{}]" + System.lineSeparator() + urlPaths, jarFindName);
101                 return null;
102             }
103             return metainfUrls.get(0);
104         }
105 
106         private MainJarInfo buidFromManifestUrl(URL manifestUrl) {
107 
108             // check parameter
109             if (manifestUrl == null) {
110                 return null;
111             }
112 
113             // resolve jarName from jarfile path
114             String jarFilePath = manifestUrl.toString().substring(0, manifestUrl.toString().indexOf('!'));
115             String jarName = jarFilePath.substring(jarFilePath.lastIndexOf("/") + 1, jarFilePath.length());
116 
117             // resolve manifest
118             Manifest manifest;
119             try (InputStream is = manifestUrl.openStream()) {
120                 manifest = new Manifest(is);
121             } catch (IOException e) {
122                 throw new IllegalStateException(e);
123             }
124 
125             // resolve metainf prop
126             String applicationName = getManifestValue(manifest, "Application-Name", UNKNOWN_INFORMATION);
127             String version = getManifestValue(manifest, "Application-Version", UNKNOWN_INFORMATION);
128             String mainClassName = getManifestValue(manifest, "Main-Class", UNKNOWN_INFORMATION);
129             String buildtime = getManifestValue(manifest, "Build-Time", UNKNOWN_INFORMATION);
130 
131             // setup MainJarInfo
132             MainJarInforInfo.html#MainJarInfo">MainJarInfo mainJarInfo = new MainJarInfo();
133             mainJarInfo.applicationName = applicationName;
134             mainJarInfo.jarName = jarName;
135             mainJarInfo.mainClassName = mainClassName;
136             mainJarInfo.version = version;
137             mainJarInfo.buildtimeInfo = buildtime;
138 
139             return mainJarInfo;
140         }
141 
142         private String getManifestValue(Manifest manifest, String key, String defaultValue) {
143             String value = manifest.getMainAttributes().getValue(key);
144             return  (value == null) ? defaultValue : value;
145         }
146     }
147 
148 
149     // ----------------------------------------------------- inner class def
150 
151     static class FindJarMatcher implements Predicate<Object> {
152         private Pattern pattern;
153         private FindJarMatcher(String findJarName) {
154             this.pattern = Pattern.compile(findJarName);
155         }
156         @Override
157         public boolean test(Object input) {
158             return pattern.matcher(input.toString()).find();
159         }
160     }
161 }
